comment: * A CursorController instance can be used to control a cursor in the text.

methods.name: public void show()
methods.comment:
* Makes the cursor controller visible on screen.
         * See also {@link #hide()}.

methods.name: public void hide()
methods.comment:
* Hide the cursor controller from screen.
         * See also {@link #show()}.

methods.name: public void onDetached()
methods.comment:
* Called when the view is detached from window. Perform house keeping task, such as
         * stopping Runnable thread that would otherwise keep a reference on the context, thus
         * preventing the activity from being recycled.
